text: Lillix (formerly Tigerlily) was a Canadian pop rock band from Cranbrook, British Columbia. Lillex has five members in the band; the current band members are Tasha-Ray Evin, Lacey-Lee Evin, Eric Hoodicoff, Cameron Brass and Alex Varon. They released their third studio album, Tigerlily on August 24, 2010. == Band members == ;Current *Tasha-Ray Evin *Lacey-Lee Evin *Eric Hoodicoff *Cameron Brass *Alex Varon ;Former *Louise Burns *Ashley Grobell *Sierra Hills *Kim Urhahn *Alicia Warrington *Scott Thompson *Britt Black == Discography == ===Albums=== *Falling Uphill (2003) *Inside the Hollow (2006) *Tigerlily (2010) ===Singles=== *It's About Time (2001) *What I Like About You (2002) *Tomorrow (2003) *Sweet Temptation (Hollow) (2006) *Nowhere to Run (2010) *Dreamland (2010) == Other websites == *Lillix Official website Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Canadian rock bands
title: Lillix
